title: Final integration test: bootstrap with ATEF
description: Comprehensive final test: Use smart-bootstrap.md to create a test project with data-analytics template, verify all ATEF components are included correctly, test complete workflow (task creation, validation gates, pattern application, checkpoints, error catalog), verify template detection works, document any issues. This validates the entire ATEF implementation.
notes: Final integration test documented in .claude/tasks/integration-test-results.md (Phase 5, task 49). Test verified: all 4 components functional, 6 integration points working (gates↔catalog, gates↔patterns, gates↔checkpoints, patterns↔tasks, checkpoints↔tasks, catalog↔patterns), backward compatibility maintained, cross-field validation correct, performance acceptable. Complete ATEF lifecycle tested from pre-execution gate through checkpoint creation, pattern application, execution, and post-execution validation. All test results: PASS.
